thread.section_title: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Go High!
thread.title_full: Go High! - Review of Hyatt Centric Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LassiComeHome
title: Go High!
text:
I was hesitant staying at a hotel so close to Times Square - but as I wanted to visit many attractions nearby - e.g. MoMA - I decided to give it a go. I requested a high floor as noise can be an issue in this area - I got the 44th floor - noise was no issue as a result.
The hotel was great - good sized room, great bar on the top floor (although expensive as you would expect) and the location great. Had a great 2 days in this great city...
